SELECT q.qnaindex,q.category,q.createat ,q.title, q.content, u.name AS user_name, q.reply, q.replydate, a.name AS admin_name
SELECT COUNT(*) AS qnaindex
FROM user u, qnapost AS q LEFT OUTER JOIN admin AS a ON q.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE q.user_id = u.user_id
AND q.category = ${category}
AND q.title LIKE '%${title}%'
AND q.reply IS NULL
AND q.reply IS NOT NULL
AND DATE_FORMAT(q.createat, '%Y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{min}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(q.createat, '%Y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{max}, '%Y%m%d')
LIMIT ${page} , ${count}

SELECT q.category,q.createat ,q.title, q.content, u.name AS user_name, u.phone, q.reply, q.replydate, a.name AS admin_name FROM user u, qnapost AS q LEFT OUTER JOIN admin AS a ON q.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE q.user_id = u.user_id AND q.qnaindex = ${index}
